column4: i am so lame...could someone help? i've been all over the grub manuals and walkthroughs...wtf is the second hdd called for grub?
btw...i'm SOOO lame, the i've spent all DAY yesterday on this..
2nd physical hard drive would be hd(1,0), hd(1,1), hd(1,2) etc. (the first, second, and third partitions)
The first physical hard drive is hd(0,0), hd(0,1), etc.
